name: Net Group
description:
Net Group is an EMEA-based technology company that helps to establish and develop seamless business processes. We are experts in creating software in the following business domains:
e-Commerce
e-Justice
Digital Utility business
FinTech
We have a team of 100 motivated developers and analysts, ready to deliver solutions that give you real business value. We aim to understand the challenges in your business and come up with the solutions you really need. Sometimes those solutions can result in something entirely different than solving the original problem.
